SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AuthService
AuthService provides authentication-related services such as login, email verification, password reset, and two-factor authentication.
BankApiSimulator
REST API endpoint that simulates a bank's payment notification system.
Budget
Represents a budget entity associated with a user.
BudgetBean
BudgetBean is a managed bean that handles budget-related operations for a user, including setting total budgets, category budgets, and retrieving spent amounts.
DatabaseFriends
A temporary class to manage friend relationships in the database until the friend system is implemented.
DatabaseMigration
A utility class for performing database migrations.
DatabasePrint
A utility class for printing database tables to the console.
DepositBean
Bean handling deposit functionality.
EmailService
Service for sending emails, including verification and password reset emails.
FriendBean
Bean for managing friendships.
Friends
Represents a friends entity associated with a user.
InventoryService
Service class for inventory management.
PaymentInfo
Data class representing payment information received from bank API.
PaymentService
Service class handling payment processing and QR code generation for the e-wallet application.
PiggyBankBean
PiggyBankBean is a managed bean that handles operations related to the piggy bank feature.
RateLimiterService
Service for limiting the rate of login attempts made by a user for a specific email.
RegistrationResult
Represents the result of a registration process.
RequestBean
Manages money request operations This bean handles the creation, acceptance, decline, and deletion of money requests between users.
RequestMoney
Represents a request for money between users.
RestApplication
JAX-RS application configuration class.
RestApplication
Configures the REST API path and registers resources for the store simulator.
SecurityFilter
Security filter for protecting pages that should only be accessed by authenticated users.
SendBean
Bean for sending money to a user account to anoter one using email or variable symbol of another user
SessionTimeoutConfig
Configures the session timeout for the application.
SimulatedPayment
Data Transfer Object (DTO) for receiving payment information from bank simulator.
SimulatedTransaction
DTO for mapping transaction data received from the frontend.
StoreApiSimulator
REST API endpoint for simulating store transactions.
Transaction
Represents a transaction between users or deposit/withdraw.
TransactionBean
Manages transaction-related operations and chart visualizations.
TransactionHandler
Service class to handle transaction logic.
User
Represents a user entity in the system.
UserBean
Manages user-related operations such as login, 2FA, and password reset.
VerificationBean
Managed bean for handling email verification processes.
WithdrawalBean
Bean for withdrawing money from user account to a bank account using IBAN set in user account page
